actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to impose an additional liability upon owners and operators of vessels, onshore facilities, and offshore facilities for the discharge of oil onto private property, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Imposes, under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, an additional liability upon owners and operators of vessels, onshore facilities and offshore facilities for the discharge of oil onto private property.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to impose an additional liability upon owners and operators of vessels, onshore facilities, and offshore facilities for the discharge of oil onto private property, and for other purposes.
